name: Rumble Livestream
author: LumiaStream
description: Monitor Rumble livestream status and trigger events based on stream activity.
longDescription: Poll the Rumble livestream API to react instantly when your stream starts, ends, or experiences large viewer swings. Automatically keep Lumia Stream variables in sync so you can drive overlays, lights, and automation logic.
changelog:
# Changelog

## 1.0.0
- Initial release
- Rumble API polling
- Stream start/end detection
- Viewer count change tracking
- Template variable updates
- Manual action handlers
